definition: variant of 答理[da1 li5]
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
variant of 不答理[bu4 da1 li3]
not wishing to acknowledge sb/unwilling to respond

sentences.english: Fifth, You shall not reply to the brainless people.
The best way to deal with a tease is to ignore him.
sentences.chinese: 对付爱捉弄人的人的最佳方法就是不搭理他。

sentences.english: But banks are so gun-shy now that no one would touch us.
sentences.chinese: 但现在银行如此风声鹤唳，没有银行搭理我们。

sentences.english: Also look after your hair at home.
sentences.chinese: 在家也要注意搭理你的头发。

sentences.english: They are coming to me, but this time I am not willing to talk.
sentences.chinese: 他们走过来，但这次我不想搭理他们。

sentences.english: Instead, I was the odd foreigner no one spoke to.
sentences.chinese: 相反，我才是一个没人搭理的奇怪的外国人。

sentences.english: A fit of the sullen got short shrift in our house.
sentences.chinese: 在我们家里，闷闷不乐是不会有人搭理你的。

sentences.english: A fit of sullens got short shrift in our house.
sentences.chinese: 在我们家生闷气是没有人搭理的。

sentences.english: If we run into her at the mall, I don't even want to talk to her.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们在商场里撞见，我可不愿意搭理她。

sentences.english: A fit of the  sullens got short shrift in our house.
sentences.chinese: 在我们家里，闷闷不乐是不会有人搭理你的。

sentences.english: A fit of the sullens got short shrift in our house.
sentences.chinese: 在我们家里，闷闷不乐是不会有人搭理你的。

sentences.english: Yes,I always have no time to respond my companions in the game.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我总是没空搭理我游戏中的同伴。

sentences.english: Nobody wants to take orders from a kid.
sentences.chinese: 没人愿意搭理一个毛头小子。

sentences.english: it's been six months and still no word - i don't deserve it?
sentences.chinese: 六个月了，还没音信，我真的就不值得你搭理嘛？

definition: to heed/to pay attention to
to acknowledge/to respond/to answer/to pay attention/to heed/to deal with
not wishing to acknowledge sb/unwilling to respond
variant of 不答理[bu4 da1 li3]
to understand/to pay attention to/to take notice of
to refuse to acknowledge/to pay no attention to/to take no notice of/to ignore
to answer/to respond/to converse
to utter a word
to talk/to get into conversation with/to send word
to invite a snub/to court a rebuff
variant of 睬[cai3]
to pay attention/to take notice of/to care for
to utter a word/to make a sound/to cheep/to squeak/also pr. [zi1 sheng1]
to utter a sound
from the start/absolutely/entirely/simply
to look cold and indifferent/standoffish
to respond
